Views¶

chat.views.index(request)[source]¶

This is a view to render the chat messages.

Handles the rendering of the chat interface and processes incoming chat messages.

chat.views.login_view(request)[source]¶

This renders the view for the login Screen and send request do django authenticate function

chat.views.logout_view(request)[source]¶
chat.views.register_view(request)[source]¶

Renders the register view and create a new user with django create_user function
